caption.title: Multivariate analysis of socio-demographic characteristics associated with the use of social media to seek information regarding chikungunya.
caption.p: 1The variable unemployed includes student, housewife and volunteer. 2Antillean Guilders, 1 ANG = 0.54 USA dollars and 0.47 EUR. *Significance was determined at an alpha level of 0.05. Note: Nagelkerke R 2 = 0.181 (18.1%), Omnibus (p = 0. 00), and Hosmer and Lemeshow (p = 0. 31) show a good fit of the model.
